snippet.title: Exposing the World’s Biggest Crime Syndicate: Chevron | The Daily Show
snippet.description:
Human rights lawyer Steven Donziger beat Chevron in court and then its goon squad came after him. Roy Wood Jr. listens to Donziger’s story about how he ended up under house arrest for 643 days. #DailyShow #RoyWoodJr #StevenDonziger

Subscribe to The Daily Show:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwWhs_6x42TyRM4Wstoq8HA/?sub_confirmation=1

About The Daily Show:
Trevor Noah and The Daily Show correspondents tackle the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture.

The Daily Show with Trevor Noah airs weeknights at 11/10c on Comedy Central.
